articles.description: Families and friends gather to dance, drum at annual Kyiyo Powwow The Missoulian A kaleidoscope of colorful fans, regalia and headdresses formed as Native American dancers shuffled in a circle to the steady beat of a drum at the 51st annual...
articles.content:
A kaleidoscope of colorful fans, regalia and headdresses formed as Native American dancers shuffled in a circle to the steady beat of a drum at the 51st annual Kyiyo Powwow on Saturday in Adams Fieldhouse.
